description:
Chiyo is introduced to Nozaki`s other assistant, who he calls Mikorin, Mikoshiba Mikoto. Chiyo was expecting someone who was the healing type, but instead finds out that he is the exact opposite. Mikorin tries to act tough as Chiyo`s senpai assistant, but he ends up having a rather surprising side to him...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Say Hello to the New Heroine
新[ニュー]ヒロインをよろしくね♪
